title: World's biggest firms foresee $1 trillion climate cost hit, report finds
text: More than 200 of the world's largest listed companies forecast that climate change could cost them a combined total of almost $1 trillion, according to a report.

title: China is ramping up its own chip industry amid a brewing tech war. That could hurt US firms
text: "If the United States blocks the Chinese industry for a long time, it will inspire China to lead another ecosystem," one analyst said.
